title: @Riot Release Jhin on February 2nd (2/2)
body:
2 + 2 = 4
Jhin loves 4.
Do it for the thematic consistency.

replies.body: Or.....you know....they could just release him on the 4th instead.
It will be twosday as well
im sick of waiting just release him tomorrow plz

more than likely release on thursday because:

thursday is the fourth day in a week

it'll be february fourth

> [{quoted}](name=oOoIceIceBabyoOo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VQUYLjE7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-01T00:03:03.934+0000)
>
> more than likely release on thursday because:
> 
> thursday is the fourth day in a week
> 
> it'll be february fourth

Isn't Thursday considered the 5th day? Most Calendars I believe consider Sunday as the first day.

I guess it really depends on how you look at it. While most calendars say it starts on sunday Some people think the week starts on Monday, others think the week starts the day they have to go back to work (which could be any day of the week) and even a few people say it begins as soon as the weekend starts on saturday. but it really doesn't matter since time is relative n'stuff.

Also, technically it will be the 4th day... of February .__.
Thursday is the fifth day, homie.

Nope.
The numbering system is Abrahamic in origin. English uses the Christian tradition of Sunday as the seventh day, making Saturday the 6th, Friday the fifth and Thursday the 4th.

#etymology #etymologyman
https://xkcd.com/1010/
https://xkcd.com/1012/

Dog, I just checked every modern calendar in a 30 miles radius that says all that shit is wrong and out of date... soooo...

**#TimesChangeBro**
Honestly, musically speaking, 4/4 would make more sense because that means four beats per measure and each beat is worth a quarter note. But you know... april... :p
They better have a skin where this champion is an alcoholic like Gragas. Not buying till I get that.
But if they release him tomorrow, it'll be four days after the patch.
